p.d: Joseph Augereau's body is found on the edge of a forest. He died through blood loss, his leg caught in a wolf trap, an animal of which he was terrified. Because a curse lay on his family, who were said to be wolf prey. Directed by: Nicolas Herdt (season 2, France, 2016) Screenplay: CÃ©cilia Sussanbier Cast: Vanessa David (Margot Laurent), Julien Baumgartner (Arthur du Plessis), Christian Rauth (Stavros), Nathalie Blanc (the public prosecutor), Maud Forget (Garnier) Genre: detective
